content: garden path bag using a turkish cast-on co 88 stitches 44 per needle and work in magic loop technique on longer needles or co 88 stitches using a long tail cast on with 16 circulars and leave a long tail for seaming place markers at bor and halfway point and begin working in the round if starting with the turkish cast-on switch to 16 inch circular after increases are complete round 1-2 knit round 3 *k1 m1r k to 1 stitch before marker m1l k1 repeat materials from * to end of round 4 sts increased round 4 knit yarn 1 skein miss babbs killington round 5-14 repeat rounds 3-4 112 stitches total 350yds/120g or other dk weight yarn continue to round 15 below makes either the bag or cowl needles cowl bag cast on 128 stitches place marker and begin knitting in the round us6 needles 32 for turkish cast on rounds 1 - 14 twisted rib *k2tbl p2 repeat from * to end of and magic loop technique or 16 round circular for long tail cast on cobblestone path cowl bag & cowl us6 24 circular stitch pattern round 15-17 purl notions stitch markers round 18 *p1 k1 p1 in the same stitch k3tog repeat from * to end gauge and size of round round 19 purl gauge round 20 *k3tog p1 k1 p1 in the same stitch repeat from * to 20 sts x 28 row = 4 stockinette end of round size round 21-28 repeat rounds 17-20 twice bag 11 w x 12 high - measured flat cowl 12 w x 13 high - measured flat round 29-31 purl abbreviations round 32-39 knit co cast on rounds 40-41 purl checkerboard bor beginning of round path stitch pattern k knit rounds 42 knit p purl rounds 43-46 *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of round tbl knit stitch through back loop rounds 47-50 *k4 p4 repeat from * to end of round m1r make one right rounds 51-58 repeat rounds 43-50 once m1l make one left round 59 knit k3tog knit next 3 stitches together bobble bind off darnknitanyway com ©2025 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn 651-342-1386 we hope you make beautiful knit items for yourself or your loved ones garden path page 2 rounds 60-61 purl rounds 62-69 knit i-cord drawstring rounds 70-71 purl brick path stitch pattern cast on three stitches on circular round 72 knit needle or dpn round 73 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round knit one row round 74-76 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end of round do not turn slide stitches to the round 77-85 repeat rounds 72-76 once then rounds other end of the needle 72-74 once more knit across bringing yarn behind round 86-87 purl the work continue to round 88 of either cowl or bag below repeat last two steps until your icord is ~24 inches long cowl cobblestone path bind off rounds 88-94 knit
